statements: SELECT * FROM employee_volunteer_hours
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours FROM employee_volunteer_hours GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT * FROM employee_volunteer_hours ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_volunteer_hours WHERE hours_worked > 5
SELECT employee_id, AVG(hours_worked) AS avg_hours FROM employee_volunteer_hours GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT * FROM employee_volunteer_hours WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY date DESC, hours_worked ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours FROM employee_volunteer_hours GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_hours > 10 ORDER BY total_hours DESC;

SELECT volunteer_id, employee_id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date, hours_worked FROM employee_volunteer_hours WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY formatted_date ASC, hours_worked DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_volunteer_hours WHERE hours_worked > 8 AND (employee_id = 200 OR employee_id = 300) ORDER BY employee_id ASC, hours_worked DESC;

SELECT employee_id, COUNT(volunteer_id) AS total_volunteers, AVG(hours_worked) AS avg_hours_worked FROM employee_volunteer_hours GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_volunteers >= 2 ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM volunteer_hours WHERE hours_worked > 10;
SELECT employee_id, program_id FROM employee_programs ORDER BY program_id ASC, employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hours_worked FROM employees JOIN volunteer_hours ON employees.employee_id = volunteer_hours.employee_id WHERE hours_worked > 10;

SELECT e.employee_name, p.program_name FROM employee_programs ep JOIN employees e ON ep.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN programs p ON ep.program_id = p.program_id ORDER BY e.employee_name, p.program_name;
SELECT employee_name, program_name FROM employee_programs ep JOIN employees e ON ep.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN programs p ON ep.program_id = p.program_id WHERE e.department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE total_hours > 40;
SELECT event_name, location, date FROM VolunteerEvent WHERE hours_required > 5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, department, email FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT event_id, event_name, location FROM VolunteerEvent WHERE date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM Employee WHERE total_hours > 40 ORDER BY department DESC;

SELECT e.name, v.event_name, ev.hours_worked FROM Employee e INNER JOIN EmployeeVolunteer ev ON e.employee_id = ev.employee_id INNER JOIN VolunteerEvent v ON ev.event_id = v.event_id WHERE ev.hours_worked > 10 ORDER BY e.name, v.date;
SELECT name, department, SUM(total_hours) AS total_worked_hours FROM Employee GROUP BY department ORDER BY total_worked_hours DESC;

SELECT e.name AS Employee_Name, SUM(ev.hours_worked) AS Total_Worked_Hours FROM Employee e INNER JOIN EmployeeVolunteer ev ON e.employee_id = ev.employee_id GROUP BY e.name HAVING Total_Worked_Hours > 20 ORDER BY Total_Worked_Hours DESC, e.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM volunteering_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM volunteering_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hours_worked FROM employees JOIN employee_volunteer_hours ON employees.employee_id = employee_volunteer_hours.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC, employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';

SELECT e.employee_name, v.event_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN employee_volunteer_hours ev ON e.employee_id = ev.employee_id INNER JOIN volunteering_events v ON ev.event_id = v.event_id WHERE ev.hours_worked > 5 ORDER BY e.employee_name ASC;
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM departments ORDER BY department_id;

SELECT e.employee_name, ev.hours_worked, v.event_date FROM employees e JOIN employee_volunteer_hours ev ON e.employee_id = ev.employee_id JOIN volunteering_events v ON ev.event_id = v.event_id WHERE v.event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY v.event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT department_name, manager_name, location FROM Departments ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, description, start_date FROM Projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, p.project_name FROM Employee e JOIN EmployeeProjects ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id JOIN Projects p ON ep.project_id = p.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employee WHERE department='Marketing';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, p.project_name FROM Employee e JOIN EmployeeProjects ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id JOIN Projects p ON ep.project_id = p.project_id WHERE p.start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT department_name, manager_name, COUNT(*) AS num_employees FROM Departments JOIN Employee ON Departments.department_name = Employee.department GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY num_employees DESC;
